product.title: Evergreen Bamboo Toothbrush
product.description: A compostable toothbrush crafted from FSC-certified bamboo with plant-based, BPA-free bristles. Designed for medium softness and a comfortable ergonomic grip.

details.title: Materials
details.copy: Handle is 100% rapidly renewable bamboo finished with an organic beeswax seal. Bristles are made from castor bean oil and can be recycled through Mobi's take-back program.

details.title: Care instructions
details.copy: Rinse and dry upright after each use. Replace every 3 months or when bristles naturally soften. Compost the handle and recycle the bristles separately.

details.title: Impact
details.copy: Every purchase funds shoreline cleanups through our partnership with SeaChange. Packaging is printed with soy inks on recycled kraft paper.

items.author: Camille R.
items.body: Beautiful design and noticeably softer on my gums. The handle feels premium compared to other bamboo brushes.

items.author: Jordan P.
items.body: Love the castor bristles and sustainability story. I pair it with the Everclean stand and it looks great on the vanity.
